-e ---

# reanalysis

Alignment within the same language is called internal reanalysis.
Alignment within the same language family is called mediated reanalysis.
Alignment within unrelated languages is called external reanalysis.

Reanalysis often arises through semantic permutations.

See phono-semantic-matching of wanderwords
